item.text: As I watched, I saw on the platform above the top of the cherubim something like a sapphire, resembling the shape of a throne, appearing above them.

The Lord said to the man dressed in linen, “Go between the wheelwork underneath the cherubim. Fill your hands with burning coals from among the cherubim and scatter them over the city.” He went as I watched.
(The cherubim were standing on the south side of the temple when the man went in, and a cloud filled the inner court.)
Then the glory of the Lord arose from the cherub and moved to the threshold of the temple. The temple was filled with the cloud while the court was filled with the brightness of the Lord’s glory.
The sound of the wings of the cherubim could be heard from the outer court, like the sound of the Sovereign God when he speaks.
When the Lord commanded the man dressed in linen, “Take fire from within the wheelwork, from among the cherubim,” the man went in and stood by one of the wheels.

Then one of the <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07971" class="">stretched out</st> his <st data-num="03027 0996 03742">hand</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> was <st data-num="0996" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st>. He <st data-num="05375" class="">took</st> some and <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="02651" class="">hands</st> of the <st data-num="03847">man dressed</st> in <st data-num="0906" class="">linen</st>, who <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> it and <st data-num="03318" class="">left</st>.
(The cherubim appeared to have the form of human hands under their wings.)
As I watched, I noticed four wheels by the cherubim, one wheel beside each cherub; the wheels gleamed like jasper.

As for their <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st>, all <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> of them <st data-num="01823" class="">looked</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st>, <st data-num="0834 01961">something like</st> a <st data-num="0212" class="">wheel</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">within</st> a <st data-num="0212" class="">wheel</st>.<n id="1" />

When they<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st>, they would <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> any of the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07253" class="">directions</st> they faced <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">turning</st> as they <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st>; <st data-num="03588 04725 0834 ">in the direction</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> would <st data-num="06437" class="">turn</st> they would <st data-num="0310 01980">follow</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">turning</st> as they <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st>,

along with their <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">bodies</st>,<n id="1" /> their <st data-num="01354" class="">backs</st>, their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>, and their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st>. The <st data-num="0212" class="">wheels</st> of the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> of <st data-num="0212" class="">them</st> were <st data-num="04392" class="">full</st> of <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st>.

As for their <st data-num="0212" class="">wheels</st>, they were <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> “the <st data-num="01534" class="">wheelwork</st>”<n id="1" /> as I <st data-num="0241" class="">listened</st>.
Each of the cherubim had four faces: The first was the face of a cherub, the second that of a man, the third that of a lion, and the fourth that of an eagle.
The cherubim rose up; these were the living beings I saw at the Kebar River.

When the <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st>, the <st data-num="0212" class="">wheels</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">beside</st> them; when the <st data-num="03742" class="">cherubim</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">spread</st><n id="1" /> their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> to <st data-num="07311" class="">rise</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>, the <st data-num="0212 01571 01992">wheels</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">move</st> from their <st data-num="0681" class="">side</st>.
When the cherubim stood still, the wheels stood still, and when they rose up, the wheels rose up with them, for the spirit of the living beings was in the wheels.
Then the glory of the Lord moved away from the threshold of the temple and stopped above the cherubim.

The cherubim spread their wings, and they rose up from the earth while I watched (when they went, the wheels went alongside them). They stopped at the entrance to the east gate of the Lord’s temple as the glory of the God of Israel hovered above them.
These were the living creatures that I saw at the Kebar River underneath the God of Israel; I knew that they were cherubim.

<st data-num="0259" class="">Each</st> had <st data-num="0702 0702">four</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">faces</st>; <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> had <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> and the <st data-num="01823" class="">form</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st>.
As for the form of their faces, they were the faces whose appearance I had seen at the Kebar River. Each one moved straight ahead.
